class="row"><div class="col-md-9"><div class="pm__card p-5" style="min-height: 510px;"><div><h2 class="section-title">About BEPZA</h2></div> <hr> <p><p style="text-align:justify; margin-bottom:11px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background:#fdfdff"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif"><span style="font-family:Roboto"><span style="color:black">In order to stimulate rapid economic growth of the country, particularly through industrialization, the government has adopted an 'Open Door Policy' to attract foreign investment to Bangladesh. The BEPZA is the official organ of the government to promote, attract and facilitate foreign investment in the EPZs. Besides, BEPZA as the competent Authority performs inspection & supervision of the compliances of the enterprises related to social & environmental issues, safety & security at work place in order to maintain harmonious labour-management & industrial relations in EPZs. The primary objective of an EPZ is to provide special areas where potential investors would find a congenial investment climate free from cumbersome procedures.</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background:#fdfdff"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif"><b><span style="font-family:Roboto"><span style="color:black">Vision</span></span></b></span></span></span></span></p>

class="text-center">Eco -Friendly Zones</h2> <div data-v-428c596c="" class="d-none d-lg-block"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="row"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="image__side"><img data-v-428c596c="" alt="" data-src="https://www.bepza.gov.bd/public/storage/upload/eco_zone/210309022825-121210306121139-976cetp-2.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" lazy="loading"></div></div> <div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="content__side"><h5 data-v-428c596c="">Central Effluent Treatment Plant (CETPs)</h5> <p data-v-428c596c=""><p style="text-align:justify; margin-bottom:11px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif"><span style="font-family:"Roboto",serif">Central Effluent Treatment Plant (CETPs) is set up in the industrial areas where there are clusters of small scale industrial units and where many polluting industries are located. BEPZA is very much conscious about the environmental issues related to industries. The authority has set up three Central Central Effluent Treatment Plant (CETPs) in Dhaka, Chattogram and Cumilla EPZ. These CETPs are treating the liquid waste of the enterprise of those EPZs that are playing an effective role for the environment protection of EPZs and its sorroundings.</span></span></span></span></p></p></div></div> <!----></div><div data-v-428c596c="" class="row"><!----> <div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="content__side"><h5 data-v-428c596c="">Solar and LED Light</h5> <p data-v-428c596c=""><p style="margin-bottom:16px; text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif"><span style="font-family:"Roboto",serif">BEPZA has introduced solar street lights in Chattogram, Mongla, Isawrdi and Dhaka EPZ's to minimize the cost of electricity. 838 street poles have been set up with solar panel on the streets in these EPZs. Around 454 KW solar panels have also been installed at different EPZs. </span></span></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:16px; text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif"><span style="font-family:"Roboto",serif">Moreover, to introduce low carbon zone initiative BEPZA already been requested to the enterprises for installation of the energy efficient Light Emitting Diod (LED) bulb replacing the conventional one.</span></span></span></span></p></p></div></div> <div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="image__side"><img data-v-428c596c="" alt="" data-src="https://www.bepza.gov.bd/public/storage/upload/eco_zone/210306122349-906solar-1.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" lazy="loading"></div></div></div><div data-v-428c596c="" class="row"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="image__side"><img data-v-428c596c="" alt="" data-src="https://www.bepza.gov.bd/public/storage/upload/eco_zone/210306111139-631wtp-1.JPG" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" lazy="loading"></div></div> <div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="content__side"><h5 data-v-428c596c="">Water Treatment Plant (WTP)</h5> <p data-v-428c596c=""><p><span style="color:#000000;"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif"><span style="font-family:"Roboto",serif">Water Treatment Plant (WTP) facilitates the service for water purification by removing the different impurities in the raw water, to render the water safe and clean. There are six Water Treatment Plants under BEPZA which are operating in Chattogram, Adamjee, Karnaphuli, Mongla, Ishwardi and Cumilla EPZs. BEPZA with the help of a service oriented industries treats the saline water and then supply fresh water to the enterprises of EPZs.</span></span></span></span></span></p></p></div></div> <!----></div><div data-v-428c596c="" class="row"><!----> <div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="content__side"><h5 data-v-428c596c="">Power Plant (PP)</h5> <p data-v-428c596c=""><p style="text-align:justify; margin-bottom:11px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif"><span style="font-family:"Roboto",serif">Two service oriented industries has set up their power plants for producing and supplying for 200 megawatt electricity to the enterprise in three EPZs  i.e. Chattogram, Dhaka, Karnaphuli EPZs. BEPZA has approved these companies to solve power crisis of the EPZs and surroundings areas. These companies are allowed for supply and sale their surplus power to the national power grid after meeting plants in the EPZs are contributing to the national economy. </span></span></span></span></p></p></div></div> <div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="image__side"><img data-v-428c596c="" alt="" data-src="https://www.bepza.gov.bd/public/storage/upload/eco_zone/210309021727-547UPGD.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" lazy="loading"></div></div></div><div data-v-428c596c="" class="row"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="image__side"><img data-v-428c596c="" alt="" data-src="https://www.bepza.gov.bd/public/storage/upload/eco_zone/210307115247-218women.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" lazy="loading"></div></div> <div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="content__side"><h5 data-v-428c596c="">Women empowerment</h5> <p data-v-428c596c=""><p>BEPZA set a milestone in women empowerment.Economic miracle of Bangladesh is driven by theeconomic inclusion of women and associated social changes. These companies are allowed for supply and sale their surplus power to the national power grid after meeting plants in the EPZs are contributing to the national economy. </span></span></span></span></p></p></div></div></div><div data-v-428c596c="" class="row d-block d-lg-none my-3"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="image__side"><img data-v-428c596c="" alt="" data-src="https://www.bepza.gov.bd/public/storage/upload/eco_zone/210307115247-218women.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" lazy="loading"></div></div> <div data-v-428c596c="" class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 px-0"><div data-v-428c596c="" class="content__side"><h5 data-v-428c596c="">Women empowerment</h5> <p data-v-428c596c=""><p>BEPZA set a milestone in women empowerment.Economic miracle of Bangladesh is driven by theeconomic inclusion of women and associated social changes. EPZâs under BEPZA has been moving towards to provide women all facilities. A large number of female workforces are working in EPZs, the percentage of female workers stands around 66%. Every year a wide range of women are transformed as the productive workforce in EPZs.</p></p></div></div></div> <hr data-v-428c596c=""></div></section> <section class="video"><div     $('.search__close').click(function () {
        $('.search__box').removeClass('show')
    })
    $('#show__search').click(function () {
        $('.search__box').addClass('show')
    })
    $('.oss__right__button').click(function () {
        let id = $('.oss__menu').attr("id");
        if (id === "show_menu") {
            $('.oss__menu').removeAttr('id', "show_menu")
        } else {
            $('.oss__menu').attr('id', "show_menu")
        }
    })
    $('#close__oss__menu').click(function () {
        let id = $('.oss__menu').attr("id");
        if (id === "show_menu") {
            $('.oss__menu').removeAttr('id', "show_menu")
        } else {
            $('.oss__menu').attr('id', "show_menu")
        }
    })

</script>

.loading-anime{padding:1.5rem 5rem;position:relative}.loading-anime .shape{border-bottom:20px solid transparent;border-left:30px solid #f4f4f4;border-top:20px solid transparent;display:block}.loading-anime .shape.shape1{border-left:30px solid #007f3d}.loading-anime .shape.shape2{border-left:30px solid #6dc8be}.loading-anime .shape.shape3{border-left:30px solid #ed1c24;margin-left:20px;position:absolute;top:40px}.processing{font-size:15px;margin-top:-50px}.processing:after{animation:dots 1s steps(5) infinite;content:".";font-size:70px}@keyframes dots{0%,20%{color:#ed1c24;text-shadow:.25em 0 0 transparent,.5em 0 0 transparent}40%{color:#007f3d;text-shadow:.25em 0 0 transparent,.5em 0 0 transparent}60%{text-shadow:.25em 0 0 #007f3d,.5em 0 0 transparent}80%,to{text-shadow:.25em 0 0 #007f3d,.5em 0 0 #007f3d}}img.loader-img{padding:30px}.card-body.loader{height:100%;position:fixed;text-align:center;width:100%}
